content: खंडित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [खंड्-क्त] {@--1@} Cut, broken in pieces. {@--2@} Destroyed, annihilated, lost, decayed; खंडित च वसुनि <ls>Bh. 3. 33.</ls> {@--3@} Refuted (in argument), controverted. {@--4@} Rebelled. {@--5@} Disappointed, betrayed, abandoned; खंडितयुवतिविलापं <ls>Gīt. 8.</ls> --ता A woman whose husband or lover has been guilty of infidelity, and who is therefore angry with him; one of the {8} principal Nāyikās in Sanskrit; <ls>R. 5. 67</ls>; <ls>Me. 39.</ls> She is thus described: --पार्श्वमेति प्रियो यस्या अन्यसंभोगचिह्रितः . सा खंडितेति कथिता धीरैरीर्ष्याकषायिता <ls>S. D. 114.</ls>
